site_settings.description: Enable single sign on via an external site (WARNING: USERS' EMAIL ADDRESSES *MUST* BE VALIDATED BY THE EXTERNAL SITE!)
Do not restrict the domain for return_paths provided by SSO (by default return path must be on current site)
Implement Discourse SSO provider protocol at the /session/sso_provider endpoint, requires sso_secret to be set
Log verbose SSO related diagnostics to /logs
URL of single sign on endpoint (must include http:// or https://)
Secret string used to cryptographically authenticate SSO information, be sure it is 10 characters or longer
Overrides user bio in user profile and prevents user from changing it
Overrides local email with external site email from SSO payload on every login, and prevent local changes. (WARNING: discrepancies can occur due to normalization of local emails)
Overrides local username with external site username from SSO payload on every login, and prevent local changes. (WARNING: discrepancies can occur due to differences in username length/requirements)
Overrides local full name with external site full name from SSO payload on every login, and prevent local changes.
Overrides user avatar with external site avatar from SSO payload. If enabled, disabling allow_uploaded_avatars is highly recommended
Redirect unapproved SSO accounts to this URL
A pipe-delimited list of email domains that users are not allowed to register accounts with. Example: mailinator.com|trashmail.net
A pipe-delimited list of email domains that users MUST register accounts with. WARNING: Users with email domains other than those listed will not be allowed!
Don't inform users of an account's existence when they use the forgot password dialog.
When logging out, log out ALL sessions for the user on all devices
Notify moderators if new users have been waiting for approval for longer than this many hours. Set to -1 to disable notifications.
User will remain logged in for n hours since last visit
